original: 至墳所復謂眾云今朝正當三月八。
analyzed: 至墳所復謂眾云今朝正當三月八。
translated: At the grave site, he said to the assembly again: Today is the eighth day of the third month.
Those who send off the dead, listen to me speak.
Look at the peach blossoms on the roadside, red,
All the tears in the eyes of those leaving home.
He went up to the hall and said:
In the second month of spring, gradually warming up, peonies give birth to eggs.
Purple swallows huddle together, yellow orioles open their eyes.
Together we appreciate the fragrant spring, three cups and two glasses.
Only White Cloud has been carrying a board all his life.
